issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

All supported ios devices - This broke in 1.6.1, last working build was 1.5.1GA

  1. Base UI > Views > Table Views > Table View (layout 3)
  2. tap the + icon
  3. tap the - icon while looking at where the + wil be drawing back in

results:
as the + icon draws in, it is incorrectly placed, flashes and lands on the correct location

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: controls draw to wrong place initially tableviews with controls

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as we no longer support this version of Kitchen Sink.
